app.viewmanagers

Class RootViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.viewmanagers.RootViewManager

  • public class RootViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the root view manager of all view managers/components. The app layout is structured in StackPane, which allows for z-indexes. Components are able to hide between one and another. A borderPane serves as the first child of the StackPane. The other children are panes representing the Help and Settings views.

    • Method Detail

      • initLayout

        public void initLayout(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Initializes all view components. The order is important, and shouldn't be changed.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - The Stage object where all components live in.

      • saveSettings

        public void saveSettings(java.lang.String filePath,
                         java.lang.Boolean enableRandomColors,
                         java.lang.Boolean enableNotifications)
        Called by SettingsView, this saves the user's settings through CommandController.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The file path string of watdo.json
        enableRandomColors - A boolean representing if the user enabled random colors in the task list.
        enableNotifications - A boolean representing if the user enabled notifications to show up.

      • closeSettings

        public void closeSettings()
        Hide the settings view and places focus in the input field.

      • openSettings

        public void openSettings()
        Fill the settings view with the user's settings and bring it to th front.

        public void setAndFocusInputField(java.lang.String text)
        Populates the inputField with a specified string and brings it into focus.
        Parameters:
        text - String to populate the inputField with.

      • refreshSidebar

        public void refreshSidebar()
        Called whenever the list experiences a change of state. This greys out the undo/redo button based on whether there are available undo/redo states.
